meanings.definition: The quality or state of being immeasurable.
meanings.sent1: The immeasurablenesses of the universe filled him with awe.
meanings.sent2: Scientists struggle to comprehend the immeasurablenesses of outer space.
meanings.sent3: The immeasurablenesses of her love for ice cream led to a freezer full of different flavors.
meanings.sent4: His patience was like the immeasurablenesses of an ocean, never-ending and deep.
meanings.sent5: The immeasurablenesses of her talent on the piano left the audience speechless.

meanings.definition: The extent or degree of being beyond measurement.
meanings.sent1: The immeasurablenesses of his wealth were evident in his luxurious lifestyle.
meanings.sent2: The immeasurablenesses of her kindness knew no bounds.
meanings.sent3: Trying to count the immeasurablenesses of stars in the sky, he lost track after a hundred.
meanings.sent4: The immeasurablenesses of time seemed to stand still in that moment.
meanings.sent5: The immeasurablenesses of her laughter echoed through the room.
